column5: A tough discussion I am glad you took the path that made his life the best it could be. As time heals hopefully your heart will find another buddy in your life.     Art
Brutal. I feel for ya. Looks like a amazing pup too! My condolences to you and your family. It really sucks man
Very sorry to hear this Dave
Thank you gentlemen,her memories will be with me forever!!!
That sucks!! I'm sorry to hear about your pal. It is really difficult but you did the right thing.

Only 4 years old,.She was a Cane Corso and the best dog by far.Stopped eating and drinking,did some tests,found out today she had a organ failure.She is gone now and I will MISS HER .So short a life,but will last with me forever!!.
So sorry to hear Dave. I know you talked alot about your love of your dogs when we are out fishing.
So sorry to hear that Dave, really sad news.  She looks like a beautiful dog.
That sucks  Dave and only 4 years old.  I lost mine to a brain tumor at only 5.    They sure do mean a lot to us and it indeed hard to say good bye.   Sorry to hear this.

Thanks guys,of all my dogs over the years she has hit the hardest.She was the kinda dog I really wanted to take with me on river trips.A little too intimidating to most but had the temperament of a lab .I'll miss you Stella!!!!!!!!!!!
Sorry for the loss , had a male brindle Corso for 8 years, they truly are an incredible breed. R
sorry to hear that Dave - so suddenly would make it way harder.
Sad to here I have a mastif x. Rottie. Great dog, sorry for your loss.
Sorry for your loss, i have an american bulldog with a face just like hers.
Thanks guys,My other two dogs are great and  a bit older,but it's that one that won't let you do anything without knowing where you are.That I will miss more than anything.
I am so sorry to hear about such a sudden loss.  It hurts. You have my sympathies.
Putting our dog down was the hardest thing I ever done. It's been almost two years and I'm still not ready to get another one.
Sorry for your loss. Dogs quickly become part of our families and part of our everyday lives.
Sorry to hear that. Way too young for sure.
Sorry to hear this , definitely one of the hardest things to deal with especially with it being so sudden .
That's tough. Deepest sympathies, I have 2 pups and they are like my kids. Hang in there.
Very sorry for your loss.
tough for sure.  so sorry
Our thoughts and prayers are with you. So sorry you suddenly lost a valued member of the family.
Man, that's tuff bud, sorry to hear that.  Jeez, it's been a bad couple of weeks for dogs around here
Thank you everyone.
Very sad news! Sorry to hear it!
Sorry for your loss.
Wow only 4 years..Tough loss..So sorry
Thanks again guys.Bit of a tough night last night.It will get better.Looks like her pancreas failed.Possibly cancer.It's just assuring your self that you made the right decision is the hardest part.
